entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:49 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 9:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: SSW 31 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
